fields.name: Star Pendant Chain
fields.summary: Pictured is a sterling silver Star Pendant coupled with a sterling silver chain. Great for young kids and adults. The chain is fine and supports the mass of the pendant.

fields.name: Mother of Pearl Pendant
fields.summary: Pictured is a mother of pearl gem encased in a 925 Sterling Silver shield that is garnished with fine stones.

fields.name: Mother of Pearl Pendant
fields.summary: Pictured is a mother of pearl gem encased in a 925 Sterling Silver shield that is garnished with fine stones.
